segments.text: Are you aware of the reason why I pulled you over ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I pulled you over because your brake light is out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I did not know that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to write you a ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't you give me a warning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not going to be able to do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much will the fine be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll find that out on your court date .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to go to court over a brake light ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have the ticket , please ?
segments.speaker: S2
